thread.title: Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Kimmel Weigh in on Late-Night Show Feud
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Kimmel Weigh in on Late-Night Show Feud

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Kimmel Weigh in on Late-Night Show Feud
text:
Comments The 'Late Show' host and the 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' presenter also discuss 'the real King of Late-Night' during their sit-down. 
Stephen Colbert welcomed his late-night rival, Jimmy Kimmel , on his show. The two hosts talked about public expectation that they would fight each other for ratings since the infamous beef between David Letterman and Jay Leno . "Isn't that crazy?" Colbert said, to which Kimmel responded, "It's a weird thing." The " Jimmy Kimmel Live! " host joked, "I might even love you. If you died I'd cry like a baby." Colbert replied with a quip, "If I didn't have a show, I'd come to your funeral." During the chat on " The Late Show with Stephen Colbert ", the duo also ridiculed their agent, James "Babydoll" Dixon. Jokes aside, they referred him as to "the real King of Late-Night," since he has Carson Daly and Jon Stewart among his clients.
